title: 2012 election : support for Romney and Obama , by ethnic group
summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 4 different Races for 2 groups Obama, and Romney that are presented on the X-axis.
In Race Black, Obama had the highest SOME LABEL 90.0 among the 2 groups and in Black, Romney had the lowest SOME LABEL 5.0.
Among all the Races, Obama had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Black and lowest SOME LABEL in Race White (non-Hispanic).
There is a gap of 53.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Obama in Race Black and White (non-Hispanic).
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 4 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups Obama, and Romney. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 2 groups, Obama had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Black and Romney had the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Black.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 4 different Races for 2 groups Obama, and Romney that are presented on the X-axis.
In Race Black, Obama had the highest SOME LABEL 90.0 among the 2 groups and in Black, Romney had the lowest SOME LABEL 5.0.
Among all the Races, Obama had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Black and lowest SOME LABEL in Race White (non-Hispanic).
There is a gap of 53.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for Obama in Race Black and White (non-Hispanic).
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 4 different Races for 2 groups Obama, and Romney that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, Obama had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Black and Romney had the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Black.
Among all the Races, Obama had the highest SOME LABEL 90.0 in Race Black and lowest value 37.0 in Race White (non-Hispanic).
The maximum SOME LABEL for Obama that was found in Race Black was 2.43 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Race White (non-Hispanic).
Among the groups, Obama had the biggest difference in SOME LABEL. Where the maximum SOME LABEL was 2.43 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL.
Averaging all 2 groups Obama, and Romney, the Race White (non-Hispanic) is the maximum SOME LABEL and Nonwhite is the minimum SOME LABEL.
